snippet: Boston College crushed Minnesota, 6-1, and Ferris State beat Union College, 3-1, in the national semifinals of the Division I men’s ice hockey tournament.
abstract: Ferris State defeats Union, 3-1, and Boston College defeats Minnesota, 6-1, to advance to NCAA men's hockey national championship game.
lead_paragraph: Boston College crushed Minnesota, 6-1, and Ferris State beat Union College, 3-1, in the national semifinals of the Division I men’s ice hockey tournament.

headline.seo: N.C.A.A. Frozen Four: Ferris State and B.C. Advance
headline.main: Top Dog and Underdog to Meet in Final
headline.print_headline: Top Dog and Underdog to Meet in Final
headline.content_kicker: Ferris State 3, Union 1 | Boston College 6, Minnesota 1
